2864}}, aged 60 years) was the thirteenth [[King of Rohan]].

column1: Folca was the son of King [[Walda]], born in a time when his country was still plagued by the [[Orcs]] who invaded Rohan after the [[War of Dwarves and Orcs]] and his father died at their hands.
A great hunter, he famously cleared Rohan of the scourge of the Orcs to avenge his father.
He rode to hunt the monstrous [[Boar of Everholt]], but suffered a mortal wound from the beast's tusks. He was succeeded by his son [[Folcwine]].<ref>{{App
Folca is a name that means "of the folk" in [[Old English]].
'''2002: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'':'''
:A tapestry recounting Folca's hunt hangs at [[Meduseld]].
